projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: Made with the Pokemon API, you can search for Pokemons by name, ID or type to find images, type, statistics and general information about them, also you can save your favorites!.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Made with the Open Weather Map API, you can check the current weather or the 7 day forecast in any city of the world.

projects.name: GitHub Dev Searcher
projects.description: React App made with the GitHub API, you search for developers to find their information, repos, followers; etc

projects.name: CRUD whith React
projects.description: CRUD performed with the React JS framework, using an API with Postman

projects.name: Ricak and Morty Wiki
projects.description: Project made with the React JS fammewor, a Wiki of the Rick and Morty series using its available API.

projects.name: Rick and Morty E-commerce
projects.description: E-commerce created, using the Rick and Morty API with Vanilla JavaScript.
